alumnis.name: Ana Rita Rebelo
alumnis.description: PhD in Computer Science in Virtual Reality & Co-founder of eBreathie and Super Save
alumnis.testimony: As Director of the Projects Department during In-Nova's founding period, part of my role was leading a diverse team, which was a constant and mutual learning experience. It offers experiences - such as teamwork, leadership and, of course, innovation - with a cosy atmosphere that fosters creativity.

alumnis.name: Ema Paulo
alumnis.description: Borgwarner's Global Team, Lean Product & Process Development
alumnis.testimony: From a member of the marketing department to president, I acquired technical skills and also learnt how to manage teams. The lessons learnt at In-Nova influence the way I approach challenges and find innovative solutions. Joining In-Nova is a journey of personal and professional growth waiting for you.

alumnis.name: Guilherme Salvador
alumnis.testimony: During my time at In-Nova, I was part of and led the Sales Department. This experience gave me a different view of what it means to have responsibilities, be proactive, manage teams and lead people. You have to be proactive and responsible if you want to make a difference.

alumnis.name: Pedro Mirão
alumnis.description: Product Owner @ Novorésumé & Master's in Electrical Engineering
alumnis.testimony: I like to say that In-Nova is the best place at Nova University for growth, finding your future startup partners, and learning how to apply your problem-solving skills. As a Vice President, I have honed my abilities in determining the best path to our goals, whether it involves leading the team and applying our engineering skills.

alumnis.name: Vasco Matos
alumnis.testimony: In-Nova allowed me to integrate multidisciplinary teams, develop work skills that I use on a daily basis and explore multiple business areas, allowing me to understand my professional preferences. It was a differentiating factor when I entered the job market and made my adaptation to this new environment easier.
